name: HexRaysCodeXplorer
body:
###Hex-Rays Decompiler plugin for better code navigation
Support IDA Pro from 6.x version and upper with installed Hex-Rays Decompiler plugin (x86 or ARM).

**Here is the main features list schedule for first release:**
* navigation through virtual function calls in Hex-Rays Decompiler window; 
* automatic type reconstruction for C++ constructor object;
* useful interface for working with objects & classes;

### Documentation 
[HexRaysCodeXplorer Wiki page](https://github.com/REhints/HexRaysCodeXplorer/wiki)

### Authors and Contributors
Aleksandr Matrosov (@matrosov)
Eugene Rodionov (@rodionov)

### Issues tracker
[Create a new issue](https://github.com/REhints/HexRaysCodeXplorer/issues)

### Support contact
support@rehints.com
